title: My Pixel 1 stopped working a few days ago and won't respond to anything I try inc bootloader restart
content:
My Pixel Phone (1) just stopped working a few days ago. It won't respond to anything I try, including activating Recovery Mode or Bootloader Restart. 

The only response I get once in a while is the device trying to load the OS but that the the process dies and it's dead again.

Until that point the phone was fine and nothing that I can think about happened that might explain it.

Thx for your help!
ori.
